thread.title: Duke’s Grayson Allen suffered a nasty dislocated pinky vs. Miami
thread.title_full: Duke’s Grayson Allen suffered a nasty dislocated pinky vs. Miami

author: Brittany Cheng
title: Duke’s Grayson Allen suffered a nasty dislocated pinky vs. Miami
text:
*cringes*
During Saturday night’s game against Miami, Duke guard Grayson Allen jumped up to grab a rebound — but instead found himself doubled over in pain. 
Warning: It looks ... bad. 
mattclapp: Grayson Allen gets his finger jacked up ESPN College Basketball: Miami at Duke https://t.co/l8lhm196xv pic.twitter.com/48tRd7GgdH 
— FanSportsClips (@FanSportsClips) January 22, 2017 In an attempt to swat the ball, Allen jacked up his pinky finger and immediately bent over, grabbing his left hand. 
Looks like Grayson Allen's left pinky got broken/dislocated. Fingers are taped together.
— Seth Davis (@SethDavisHoops) January 22, 2017 Pretty sure Allen’s hand isn’t supposed to look like this:
Cuncel da Grayson Allen pinky pic.twitter.com/WSOUBYEk6q 
— whitesoxdave (@barstoolWSD) January 22, 2017 Adding insult to injury? Allen was whistled on that play. 
Update: Allen started the second half sidelined , reports @SethDavisHoops.
